sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SEGUIERIA, in botany; a plant belonging to the claſs of polyandria, and the order of monogynia. The calyx is pentaphyllous; the phylla are oblong, concave, coloured, and permanent; there is no corolla. The capſule is oblong and monospermous, the large ala terminating in ſmall lateral alæ. There is only one ſpecies, the americana.
